headline: Bernstein Raises PT on McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) to $320, Maintains ‘Market Perform’ Rating
summary: With significant hedge fund interest, McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) secures a spot on our list of the 15 Best Stocks to Invest in for Financial Stability. On September 15, 2025, Bernstein raised its price target on McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) from $310 to $320, maintaining a ‘Market Perform’ rating. The investment firm expects the company to outperform […]

headline: McDonald's (MCD): Exploring Valuation as Bold Promotions Reshape the Competitive Fast-Food Landscape
summary: If you feel like McDonald's (MCD) has been everywhere lately, you're not imagining it. The company has stepped up its marketing strategy with a wave of attention-getting promotions, like relaunching Extra Value Meals, limited-time deals on cheeseburgers, and even a collaboration with a hit video game to capture younger diners. These moves are not just about driving foot traffic; they are part of a broader push to keep McDonald's top of mind and wallets in hand, especially as fast-food...
